local_intent: Execute placement: ensure over red_plate, lower until contact (retry once), confirm contact, release object, and retreat.
assumptions: Robot is already moved above red_plate (consistent with Global BT MoveAbove)
Gripper currently holds the white_plate prior to placement
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT placement phase: performs lowering until contact (as annotated), verifies contact, opens gripper to release, and retreats; includes an approach/align and a retry for robustness per failure_and_recovery.
